entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h becoming south 30 late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times in the evening and after midnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
